channel.title: Project Z | Zombie Survival |
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=4][COLOR="#FF0000"]SERVER CURRENTLY :ONLINE!![/COLOR][/SIZE]
DOWNLOAD: [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/xm2xl9m26o0j1jq/client.jar?dl=1&token_hash=AAFySOHVLHed0hQALMIoGtfKo42baou1H9rIL_vYmWCSWA]Client.jar[/url]
TEMP FORUMS: [url=http://projectz.smfnew2.com/]http://projectz.smfnew2.com/[/url]
[B]developers: :admin:Me :admin:Project pk[/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/m1eVZL7.png[/img]
[B]Information about the server: The main goal of Project - Z is survival. There is only one safe zone, and it is Lumbridge. You can go around travelling by ships, which will take you to numberous of islands infested with zombies. You may think it's easy to survive in a zombie apocalypse, but when other players want you dead, and with only limited supplies, it may be very tough.
You get items from zombies, which you must slay in order to survive. You start off with a bronze sword, bronze shield and a guide book. Head out into the wilderness to begin your journey.
Are you ready? [/B]
[B]Media: [/B]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fiGYubN.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/N7mxLL5.png[/img] [IMG]http://img826.imageshack.us/img826/1885/41ts.png[/img] [IMG]http://img542.imageshack.us/img542/8404/xpwf.png[/img] [IMG]http://img845.imageshack.us/img845/3940/k7oa.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZdVc8xK.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XmqqmFW.png[/img] [IMG]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/8414/065w.png[/img] [IMG]http://img31.imageshack.us/img31/9490/zro1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0zesiav.png[/img] [IMG]http://img823.imageshack.us/img823/622/gq17.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4nkWbke.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1ITHMuF.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zmNC68z.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BlZGjZK.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Dmj7sHQ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/J0sN7HQ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dWYHl54.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RhpWka1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FtxLdZ4.png[/img] [IMG]http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/643/k0z0.png[/img] [IMG]http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/16/01q5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xiggSWT.png[/img] [IMg]http://img132.imageshack.us/img132/8510/ej91.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VtTBxaO.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KPocBBP.png[/img] [IMG]http://img593.imageshack.us/img593/761/7gfe.png[/img] [IMG]http://img35.imageshack.us/img35/9493/9nr8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SaTcvdv.png[/img] [/CENTER]

item.title: Project Z | Zombie Survival |
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

Steso:

So I must donate to make bank?

Really?

Also tried it.
Cant see zombies on minimap…
Died with starter stuff and wasnt able to continue game due to lack of items.

Read full topic

Reworked on zombie loots!

[B]EASY BELOW[/B]

[B]
MEDIUM BELOW[/B]

[B]ELITE BELOW[/B]

Mining, Smelting and Smithing released into the game

item.title: Project Z | Zombie Survival |
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

Tried it out.
Really nice concept but some things can be worked out better, or changed.

My first suggestion would be: make new players not attack able for like 10-15 minutes. :rolleyes:
So they can at least train and gain some decent items.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Z | Zombie Survival |
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Is some of this based on Dead Rising with rescuing survivors and what not? I don’t know of another game that does that. I like the development of this though. I believe this is the only development I’ve seen that has had this much effort for it as far as a zombie based server.

Read full topic

can you prove that you are that guy?

yeah, he released it as a base but you even copied every single picture. at least take your own, plus im not seeing anything that wasnt in the release.[/quote]Yeah i am Sir Ryu and i used project insanity as a base, i can show you the project thread

Also i released when it was in beta 2.0, not its 4.7 so you have to log in to see
